Package Lab04B

Class Instructor

java.lang.Object
Lab04B.Instructor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Faculty, Grad, Lecturer
public abstract class Instructor extends Object
The superclass instructor which will be extended by further subclasses

  • Constructor Details

    • Instructor

      public Instructor(int Age, int unReadMail)
      Constructor of the Instructor class
      Parameters:
      Age - the integer value of the Instructors age.
      unReadMail - the integer value which contains the value of unread mail an instructor has

    • stress

      public int stress()
      Calculates a stress value depending on the value of unReadMail. The stress value is capped at 1000
      Returns:
      tan integer stress value

    • respect

      public int respect()
      Calculates a respect value depending on the age and the eccentricities
      Returns:
      an integer value of respect

    • reduceMail

      public void reduceMail(int readMail)
      This method decreases the amount on unReadMail depending on the amount of mail read
      Parameters:
      readMail - the amount of mail you read from you unread mail

    • addToEccentricities

      public void addToEccentricities(int eccentricities)
      Increases the value of the private variable depending on the parameter eccentricities
      Parameters:
      eccentricities - the amount of eccentricities that are added to the private variable eccentricities

    • removeToEccentricities

      public void removeToEccentricities(int eccentricities)
      The method to decreas the value of the private variable eccentricities
      Parameters:
      eccentricities - the integer value of the amount that the private variable "eccentricities" will be decreased by

    • getMail

      public void getMail(int newMail)
      The method which increases the amount of unread mail an instructor has, and randomly increases or decreases the eccentricities.
      Parameters:
      newMail - the value which will increase the value of the private variable unReadMail
